comments:
The J2EE BVT tests are not finishing properly.  I see this in the log as a likely culprit.  This prevents the jdt.ui plugin from starting and leads to many other issues down the line.  This is preventing the build JUnits from running and from our execution of code coverage scanning and other declared build tests.

[echo] Running org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.tests.bvt.AutomatedBVT

I'm closing this as invalid, seemed to be related to our test framework needing to react.
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
